articles.title: Turkey Urges Kurdish Fighters to Lay Down Their Arms
articles.text: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan called on the Kurds to leave a Syrian region “this night.” He spoke as Vice President Mike Pence planned to travel to Turkey.

articles.title: China Is Leasing an Entire Pacific Island. Its Residents Are Shocked.
articles.text: What could Beijing want with Tulagi, where Allied forces fought a bloody battle with Japan in World War II? Some fear military ambitions.

articles.title: Japan's new star Kenki Fukuoka prepared to turn back on rugby to concentrate on medical career.
articles.text: For jet-heeled Japan wing Kenki Fukuoka it is not simply a case of catch him if you can but catch him while you can.
